bibl.title: A Symmachos on Mission and his Paymaster: P. Herm. 80 Enlarged.
bibl.note: Re-edition of P. Herm. Rees 80, a fragment of which has been identified in a small collection belonging to the Egypt Exploration Society and housed in the Ashmolean Museum, P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. II 137c. Receipt for payment issued by a ζυγοστάτης (weighmaster) to a σύμμαχος (armed guard or messenger) who was about to depart on a mission. Oxyrhynchus, 27 November - 26 December 553.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. II 137c + P. Herm. Rees 80
GONIS Nikolaos, A Symmachos on Mission and his Paymaster: P. Herm. 80 Enlarged.

Re-edition of P. Herm. Rees 80, a fragment of which has been identified in a small collection belonging to the Egypt Exploration Society and housed in the Ashmolean Museum, P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. II 137c. Receipt for payment issued by a ζυγοστάτης (weighmaster) to a σύμμαχος (armed guard or messenger) who was about to depart on a mission. Oxyrhynchus, 27 November - 26 December 553.
